src:
Data dan Fakta Serie A: Torino vs Juventus
01 Nov 2019, 17:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pemimpin klasemen Juventus akan main tandang melawan sang rival sekota dan peringkat 12 Torino pada pekan ke-11 Serie A 2019/20, Minggu (03/11/2019). Berikut beberapa data dan fakta yang melatarbelakangi Derby della Mole di Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino ini.
Dalam laga tandangnya melawan Torino di Serie A musim lalu, Juventus menang 1-0 melalui penalti Cristiano Ronaldo menit 70.
Juventus tak terkalahkan dalam 10 laga terakhirnya melawan Torino di semua kompetisi (M8 S2 K0).
Selalu tercipta maksimal 2 gol dalam 4 pertemuan terakhir Torino dan Juventus di semua kompetisi.
Juventus selalu menang dalam 4 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Torino di Serie A, yakni 4-1 musim 2015/16, 3-1 musim 2016/17, 1-0 musim 2017/18, dan 1-0 musim 2018/19.
Juventus memenangi 9 dari 10 laga tandang terakhirnya melawan Torino di Serie A.
Scroll terus ke bawah untuk statistik yang lebih lengkap.
text:
Serie A Data and Facts: Torino vs Juventus
Nov 01 2019, 17:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus leaders will play away against city rivals and ranked 12th Torino in Week 11 of Serie A 2019/20, Sunday (11/03/2019). Here are some data and facts behind the Derby della Mole at the Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In his away match against Torino in Serie A last season, Juventus won 1-0 through a Cristiano Ronaldo penalty in the 70th minute.
Juventus are unbeaten in their last 10 matches against Torino in all competitions (M8 S2 K0).
Always created a maximum of 2 goals in the last 4 meetings Torino and Juventus in all competitions.
Juventus always win in their last 4 away matches against Torino in Serie A, namely 4-1 2015/16 season, 3-1 2016/17 season, 1-0 2017/18 season, and 1-0 2018/19 season.
Juventus won 9 of its last 10 away games against Torino in Serie A.
Scroll down for more complete statistics.
